```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages}
setwd("~/R_databases")
library(R.matlab)
library(shiny)
```


```{r readin}
data <- readMat("data/referencedatabasebiomolecules.mat")
```

```{r code, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}


# Extract X-axis data
x <- data$Xaxis

# Loop through each sample and plot against X-axis
for (i in 1:60) {
  # Extract y-axis data for current sample
  y <- data[[i]]

  # Plot current sample against X-axis
  plot(x, y, type = "l", main = names(data)[i])
}


```
